item.title: About PupUp
item.description:
About PupUp

PupUp Studio is an experimental project investigating the running of a commercial canine photography studio. Using a temporary space in the Brixton Academy, London SW9 9SL, we're experimenting with new techniques, technology and work-flow, to streamline the production of high quality portraiture and product shots. This increases our volume, and lowers your costs, while ensuring our stringent quality standards continue to be met.
